nkhani: Chilichonse chomwe chimatenga malo komanso chokhala ndi misa
chinthu: Chinthu choyera chopangidwa ndi mtundu umodzi wokha wa atomu
atomu: Chigawo chaching'ono kwambiri cha zinthu chomwe chingathe kutenga nawo mbali muzochita za mankhwala
palimodzi: Chinthu chopangidwa ndi zinthu ziwiri kapena zingapo zomangika ndi mankhwala
molekyu: Gulu la ma atomu olumikizidwa ndi mankhwala
kusakaniza: Kuphatikiza kwa zinthu ziwiri kapena zingapo zosaphatikizana ndi mankhwala
chimodzimodzi: Kusakaniza ndi mawonekedwe ofanana ponseponse (mwachitsanzo, yankho)
zosasinthika: Kusakanikirana kokhala ndi mawonekedwe osafanana (monga kuyimitsidwa)
boma: Momwe zinthu zilili (zolimba, zamadzimadzi, gasi, plasma)
cholimba: Mkhalidwe wa chinthu chokhala ndi mawonekedwe otsimikizika ndi kuchuluka kwake
madzi: Mkhalidwe wa chinthu chokhala ndi voliyumu yotsimikizika koma yopanda mawonekedwe ake
gasi: Mkhalidwe wa chinthu wopanda mawonekedwe kapena kuchuluka kwake
anachita: Njira pomwe zinthu zimasintha ndikupanga zatsopano
chochita: Zinthu zomwe zikusintha mu chemical reaction
mankhwala: Chinthu chatsopano chopangidwa mu chemical reaction
mgwirizano: Kukakamiza kugwira maatomu pamodzi mu molekyulu kapena pawiri
Chemical formula: Njira yachidule yoyimira chinthu pogwiritsa ntchito zizindikiro ndi manambala
yankho: Kusakaniza kofanana kwa solute (chinthu chosungunuka) ndi chosungunulira (chinthu chosungunuka)
kuganizira: Kuchuluka kwa solute kusungunuka mu kuchuluka kwa zosungunulira
asidi: Zinthu zomwe zimapereka ma ayoni a haidrojeni (H+) m'madzi
maziko: Chinthu chomwe chimalandira ma hydrogen ayoni (H+) m'madzi
neutralization: Zomwe zimachitika pakati pa asidi ndi maziko, kupanga mchere ndi madzi
mphamvu zamagetsi: Mphamvu zomwe zingathe kusungidwa m'magulu a mankhwala a chinthu
